credit_line: Gift of the Catholic League for Religious and Civil Rights
title: Want to Know a Dirty Little Secret?  Condoms Don't Save Lives.
provenance: Catholic League for Religious and Civil Rights
description: C(atholic) L(eague) shield with sword at left, as if a coat of arms.  Text overall, with accented lines in purple, the rest in blue.  Complete text reads: Want to Know a Dirty Little Secret?/Condoms don't Save Lives./ But restraint does./ Only fools think condoms are foolproof./  Remember, better safe than sorry./  Some common sense and a public service message from the/ Catholic League/ for Religious and Civil Rights/1011 First Avenue/ New York, NY   10022/ (212)371-3191
name: Poster
